name: cifti-correlation-gradient
author: Washington University School of Medicin
description:
Correlate cifti rows and take gradient.

For each structure, compute the correlation of the rows in the structure, and take the gradients of the resulting rows, then average them.  Memory limit does not need to be an integer, you may also specify 0 to use as little memory as possible (this may be very slow).

inputs.name: cifti
inputs.description: the input cifti

inputs.name: cifti_out
inputs.description: the output cifti

inputs.name: left_surface
inputs.description: specify the left surface to use

type.name: left_surface
type.description: specify the left surface to use

inputs.name: surface
inputs.description: the left surface file

inputs.name: opt_left_corrected_areas_area_metric
inputs.description: vertex areas to use instead of computing them from the left surface: the corrected vertex areas, as a metric

inputs.name: right_surface
inputs.description: specify the right surface to use

type.name: right_surface
type.description: specify the right surface to use

inputs.name: surface
inputs.description: the right surface file

inputs.name: opt_right_corrected_areas_area_metric
inputs.description: vertex areas to use instead of computing them from the right surface: the corrected vertex areas, as a metric

inputs.name: cerebellum_surface
inputs.description: specify the cerebellum surface to use

type.name: cerebellum_surface
type.description: specify the cerebellum surface to use

inputs.name: surface
inputs.description: the cerebellum surface file

inputs.name: opt_cerebellum_corrected_areas_area_metric
inputs.description: vertex areas to use instead of computing them from the cerebellum surface: the corrected vertex areas, as a metric

inputs.name: opt_surface_presmooth_surface_kernel
inputs.description: smooth on the surface before computing the gradient: the size of the gaussian surface smoothing kernel in mm, as sigma by default

inputs.name: opt_volume_presmooth_volume_kernel
inputs.description: smooth the volume before computing the gradient: the size of the gaussian volume smoothing kernel in mm, as sigma by default

inputs.name: opt_presmooth_fwhm
inputs.description: smoothing kernel sizes are FWHM, not sigma

inputs.name: opt_undo_fisher_z
inputs.description: apply the inverse fisher small z transform to the input

inputs.name: opt_fisher_z
inputs.description: apply the fisher small z transform to the correlations before taking the gradient

inputs.name: opt_surface_exclude_distance
inputs.description: exclude vertices near each seed vertex from computation: geodesic distance from seed vertex for the exclusion zone, in mm

inputs.name: opt_volume_exclude_distance
inputs.description: exclude voxels near each seed voxel from computation: distance from seed voxel for the exclusion zone, in mm

inputs.name: opt_covariance
inputs.description: compute covariance instead of correlation

inputs.name: opt_mem_limit_limit_gb
inputs.description: restrict memory usage: memory limit in gigabytes

inputs.name: double_correlation
inputs.description: do two correlations before taking the gradient

type.name: double_correlation
type.description: do two correlations before taking the gradient

inputs.name: opt_fisher_z_first
inputs.description: after the FIRST correlation, apply fisher small z transform (ie, artanh)

inputs.name: opt_no_demean_first
inputs.description: instead of correlation for the FIRST operation, do dot product of rows, then normalize by diagonal

inputs.name: opt_covariance_first
inputs.description: instead of correlation for the FIRST operation, compute covariance
